name: None
description: The work will be published after approval.

name: Journal Hold
description: The work will be delayed for publication by one year because of a restriction from publication in an academic journal.

name: Patent Hold
description: The work will be delayed for publication by two years because of patent related activities.

name: Other Embargo Period
description: The work will be delayed for publication by an indefinite amount of time.

name: None
description: The work will be published after approval.

name: 6-month Journal Hold
description: The full text of this work will be held/restricted from worldwide access on the internet for six months from the semester/year of graduation to meet academic publisher restrictions or to allow time for publication.

name: 1-year Journal Hold
description: The full text of this work will be held/restricted from worldwide access on the internet for one year from the semester/year of graduation to meet academic publisher restrictions or to allow time for publication.

name: 2-year Journal Hold
description: The full text of this work will be held/restricted from worldwide access on the internet for two years from the semester/year of graduation to meet academic publisher restrictions or to allow time for publication.

name: Flexible/Delayed Release Embargo Period
description: The work will be delayed for publication by an indefinite amount of time.
